name: Is That What You Expected?
description:
full Screen mode for better experience -=-=-=- Game-Info

A Game Where 

Your goal Is To Die

And When You Shoot You Lose Health

And When Your Health Reaches Zero You Die

But Wait

Its Not That easy to die

since The Monsters Heal You And Sometimes They Drop Heal Potions

So You Have To Die As Fast As Possible

You Lose in two conditions

1- 40+ Enemy is on the field

2-If Your Time Is 24Hours + 

Good Luck

-=-=-=- Trijam-Info

Made In 3 Hours For : Trijam #200

Theme : Expect The UnExpected

Nothing That You Can't Expect

-=-=-=- Controls

wasd/arrow keys to move

left mouse Button To Shoot A Projectile

-=-=-=- Credits

Made By : Pista

Sounds Made By : Sfxr ( application) - Pista

Menu Music : Aiva.ai

Art Made By : Pista

Pre_Existed_Platform - Made By Pista

 ( Contains Scenes/Sound Managment/Tabs/etc)

-=-=-=-

Hope You All Enjoy :)
